string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Chess-Online account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: Sit ɣef useɣwen i urmad n umiḍan-inek Chess-Online account:
Ma yella ur tettwaskelseḍ ara ɣer Chess-Online, tzemreḍ ad tanfeḍ s teɣlist izen-agi.
Yettwazen-aɣ-d usuter n uwennez n wawal uffir n umiḍan-inek.
Ma yella d kečč id yessutren, sit ɣef useɣwen-a n wadda.Ma ulac, tzemreḍ ad stanfeḍ.
Tessutreḍ abeddel n tansa n yimayl-inek.
